edu.ncsu.csc216.train_travel.tickets

Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.train_travel.tickets.Reservation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BicycleClass, ComfortClass, EconomyClass

    public abstract class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract parent class for ComfortClass, EconomyClass and BicycleClass Reservations. Stores state for the Train object that the Reservation is made for, the number of passengers the Reservation is for, and the Reservation's unique ID number.
    Author:
    Noah Benveniste

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Reservation(int numPassengers, Train myTrain)
      Constructs a Reservation object.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void cancel()
      Cancels this Reservation by releasing any reserved Seats associated with this Reservation and decrementing the proper passenger counts
      abstract void changeSeats(java.lang.String seatString)
      Releases the seats reserved by this Reservation and reserves the seats
      abstract void chooseSeats()
      Reserves seats in myTrain for this Reservation based on the rules in [UC3,S4-6], [UC5,S7]

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(int numPassengers,
                   Train myTrain)
        Constructs a Reservation object. Called by the child classes, sets the state for myTrain, numPassengers and reservationID
        Parameters:
        numPassengers - the number of passengers the Reservation is for
        myTrain - the Train object the Reservation is associated with

    • Method Detail

      • getNumPassengers

        public int getNumPassengers()
        Getter method for the number of passengers
        Returns:
        numPassengers

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Getter method for the reservation ID
        Returns:
        reservationID

      • numPassengersInRange

        public static boolean numPassengersInRange(int numPassengers)
        Method that determines if the number of passengers to be added to a Reservation is valid
        Parameters:
        numPassengers - the number of passengers to be added
        Returns:
        true if the number of passengers is greater than zero and less than or equal to 6, false otherwise

      • chooseSeats

        public abstract void chooseSeats()
        Reserves seats in myTrain for this Reservation based on the rules in [UC3,S4-6], [UC5,S7]
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are not enough seats

      • changeSeats

        public abstract void changeSeats(java.lang.String seatString)
        Releases the seats reserved by this Reservation and reserves the seats
        Parameters:
        seatString - specifies which seat(s) will now be reserved for this Reservation, in the form dictated by UC7,S2-3
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if seatString represents invalid Seats for this Reservation

      • cancel

        public abstract void cancel()
        Cancels this Reservation by releasing any reserved Seats associated with this Reservation and decrementing the proper passenger counts

      • toPrint

        public abstract java.lang.String toPrint()
        Returns a string representation of this Reservation of the format dictated by UC9,S2
        Returns:
        the string representation of this Reservation
